deviceNodes.name: BLE Bridge
deviceNodes.description: The BLE-Bridge is a MyoMod device on the MyoMod bracelet that transfers real-time data between the host and the DPU.

inputs.description: Transmits pose classification data to the host

inputs.description: Transmits filtered EMG data to the host
